EmailTemplate.name: 201905_BK_Event_Oshkosh_mih.201907_BK_Email4_AB_Test_Event_Oshkosh_MC.201908_BK_
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for a great Oshkosh 2019!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]> Thank you for visiting us at Oshkosh 2019! We had a terrific show, thanks to you! We were glad you were a part of our exciting line-up this year, and hope you were able to demo our new products and services, visit our partner displays, take in a theatre session, celebrate our 60-year anniversary and view a Lancair Legacy with the full BendixKing flight deck. New Products Certificated / STCd
- AeroCruze 230 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerocruze-230]]> | Touchscreen autopilot - AeroFlight <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aeroflight]]> | KI 300 attitude indicator + KA 310 autopilot adapter - AeroVue Touch <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerovue-touch]]> | PFD/MFD touchscreen display Announcements & Repair Partners
- Airwork New Zealand <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/news-listing/2019/july/bendixking-airwork-to-certify-cockpit-upgrades-for-light-medium-size-general-aviation-helicopters]]> | STC for cockpit upgrades to Part 27 light helicopters - Cessna <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/news-listing/2019/july/bendixking-offers-new-cockpit-upgrades-for-over-6-000-cessna-aircraft]]> | Cockpit upgrade program for 6,000 Cessna single-engine piston aircraft - Pipistrel <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/news-listing/2019/july/bendixking-and-pipistrel-to-enhance-pilot-training-with-a-touchscreen-integrated-flight-deck?utm_source=social&utm_medium=facebook&utm_campaign=19_bendixking_xvuetouch]]> | xVue Touch Integrated Flight Deck for Alpha King trainer aircraft - TruTrak Flight Systems <[[https://trutrakflightsystems.com/]]> announced is now a part of BendixKing - EDMO Distributors Inc. <[[https://www.edmo.com/brands/bendixking]]>,is now a certified & experimental distribution partner
Our partners Duncan Aviation <[[https://www.duncanaviation.aero/]]> and Mid-Continent <[[https://www.mcico.com/]]>, and distributors Aviall <[[https://www.aviall.com/aviallstorefront/]]> were also on display at our booth Guest Speakers & Presentations
- Joe Coraggio <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/case-studies/2019/july/upgraded-flight-panel-gives-race-pilot-an-edge]]> | Airventure Cup Race winner of sport class in his BK Lancair Legacy - Bill Panarello <[[https://www.tbmprotraining.com/about.html]]> | Professional airline pilot and radar guru - Jeff Simon <[[https://www.inspiredpilot.com/podcast/jeff-simon-social-flight-faa-ia/]]> | President of SocialFlight <[[http://www.socialflight.com/search.php]]>, A&P, I/A and Titan T-51D Mustang builder - Technical presentations on our products and services Hosted Events & Displays
- Joe Coraggio of RampRatRacing <[[https://www.facebook.com/rampratracing/]]> had his Lancair Legacy on display. We enjoyed having you join us for our Customer Appreciation Event - We gave away Reno Air Race <[[https://airrace.org/]]> pit passes and Chairman’s Club passes to two lucky winners (please email the person on the certificate to receive your official passes) - We welcomed type clubs to our booth for their evening events - We were able to celebrate with a couple as they got engaged at our booth! We are appreciative of you being a part of our BendixKing family, and look forward to share with you our growing line-up of partnerships, products and services for experimental and certificated aircraft.
Find your area sales manager: https://www.bendixking.com/en/sales-team <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/sales-team]]> or email sales@bendixking.com <[[mailto:sales@bendixking.com]]>
Be sure to follow us on social media and see you next year at OSH 2020!
